A

add(Throwable) - Method in class team.unnamed.error.ErrorDetails
Gets the error stack-trace using getStackTrace(java.lang.Throwable) and executes ErrorDetails.add(String) to add the stack-trace to the list of messages.
add(String) - Method in class team.unnamed.error.ErrorDetails
Adds the specified message to the list of messages.

E

errorCount() - Method in class team.unnamed.error.ErrorDetails
 
ErrorDetails - Class in team.unnamed.error
Contains a collection of Throwable messages thrown during a process.
ErrorDetails(String, Collection<String>) - Constructor for class team.unnamed.error.ErrorDetails
Constructs the error details with initial messages and a heading.
ErrorDetails(String) - Constructor for class team.unnamed.error.ErrorDetails
Constructs the error details using only the heading.
Errors - Class in team.unnamed.error
Collection of util methods for easy Throwable handling.

F

format() - Method in class team.unnamed.error.ErrorDetails
Formats the error messages.

G

getStackTrace(Throwable) - Static method in class team.unnamed.error.Errors
Gets the stack trace of a specified throwable.

M

merge(ErrorDetails) - Method in class team.unnamed.error.ErrorDetails
Adds all the error messages that the parameter "details" holds, returns an ErrorDetails object that contains all the messages (this.messages and details.messages), also uses this.heading and ignores details.heading.

T

team.unnamed.error - package team.unnamed.error
 
toException(Function<String, T>) - Method in class team.unnamed.error.ErrorDetails
Constructs an exception using the current exceptions messages.
